card.title: Web 330 Landing Page
card.content: This website showcases the projects for Enterprise JavaScript 2.

card.title: WhatABook, Part 2 App
card.content: Ths application uses the openlibrary api to pull a list of books and their information using the fetch api. The list of books is displayed in a table and the user can select a record by the isbn to display it individually.

card.title: Bob's Automotive Repair Shop
card.content: This app allows the user to choose a product and add it to a cart.
